page.title: 20Attitudes in Brodsworth.
page.content: All those of us taking part in the Domesday Project have not only learned things about the area but have learned a lot about local people.The older people remember the nice things in the past and the very hard times and are pleased things are much better for younger people.The{attitudes}they have to village life is one of sadness that the village spirit of{community}has gone.Younger people and children look towards town for lots of things and often have friends there and so don't look to the village for social occasions.There is a lot of concern for the lack of amenities in the area and for the{unemployed}young people wherever they are.All the children from 7+ to 12+(20 children) have taken part in the Domesday Project.We are {Mr. Evans's}class Brodsworth School 1985.
